[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_gmaps link="#E-8_" size="140"][vc_empty_space height="24px"][vc_column_text]Address: 8500 Beverly Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90048 [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Phone numbers: 011 322 44 56, 011 322 87 17[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Email: sales@yoursite.com[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Social links:[dt_social_icons animation="none"][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="facebook" link="https://www.facebook.com/WordPress.Premium.Theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="twitter" link="https://twitter.com/premium_theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="google" link="https://plus.google.com/‎" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="dribbble" link="http://dribbble.com/dream-theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="pinterest" link="http://pinterest.com/dreamtheme/" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="instagram" link="http://instagram.com/dream_theme_photo" /][/dt_social_icons][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
